claim: Dangerous Liaisons is based on Les liaisons dangereuses.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Dangerous Liaisons is a 1988 American historical drama film based upon Christopher Hampton 's play Les liaisons dangereuses , which in turn was a theatrical adaptation of the 18th-century French novel Les Liaisons dangereuses by Pierre Choderlos de Laclos .
